project.name: arctic
project.description: Lightweight GUI framework for haXe targetting Flash 7, 8 and Flash 9
project.version: - add Arctic.makeSwitch helper - ArcticMC.setVisible is robust against empty clips (which allows the useful pattern Arctic.makeSwitch([ Fixed(0,0), Something ]) which can help reserve space for something that might show up later. - Support leaving hover in Button as null - Clean up the mess about clipping and ConstrainWidth/Height. These never clip. Instead, introduce a new Clip block.
